pullRequest.title: Rewrite lambdas to method references for instance methods
pullRequest.bodyText:
Before this PR
We would only re-write lambdas with zero parameters that invoked static methods to method references
After this PR
==COMMIT_MSG==
Rewrite single parameter lambdas that only invoke an zero param instance method to a method reference
==COMMIT_MSG==
Possible downsides?
N/A

commit.message: rewrite lambdas to method references for instance methods
fix up potential visibility bug in suggested fixes (#1362)

Fix for method references with type parameters (#1363)

`Optional<String>::toString` does not compile
